actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to clarify the status of certain waters in the State of New Hampshire for the purposes of the Federal Boat Safety Act of 1971.

summary.text: Provides that for purposes of the Federal Boat Safety Act of 1971, the following waters lying entirely within the State of New Hampshire are declared nonnavigable: Lake Winnisquam, Lake Winnipesaukee, and specified portions of the Merrimack River.

titles.title: A bill to clarify the status of certain waters in the State of New Hampshire for the purposes of the Federal Boat Safety Act of 1971.
